strIntroduction: The most special tour- A day-trip to South and North Korea's border! You can feel the military atmosphere after Korean War as if you were a soldier then in this tour. strIntroduction: Leave the busy city of Seoul behind on a one-day excursion to Mt Seorak (Seoraksan), South Korea’s third-highest mountain. As you explore with your fun and knowledgeable guide, see why this UNESCO-protected mountain is one of the country’s most popular destinations, named for its slowly melting covering of snow. Your one-day tour also visits tranquil temples and a thriving fish market, taking you behind the scenes to glimpse daily life in South Korea.

strIntroduction: 穿上美美的婚紗留下一生中最難忘的身影一直是每個女孩們的小小心願！我們為了情侶及小資族特別設計了精簡版的婚紗體驗，與多家攝影工作室合作，用最合理的價格提供韓國最高品質的婚紗服務，讓您輕鬆留下最美麗的瞬間！
strTitle: 【小資情侶必備】 韓國吉安得婚紗攝影體驗

strIntroduction: The dining tour package specially arranged for English/ Chinese speaking customers! In this half-day tour, our local guide will not only introduce you plenty of delicious dishes, from traditional kimchi soup to Korean BBQ, but take you around in Seoul to enjoy the night view of this gorgeous city!
strTitle: Let's Dine Out: Seoul Night Dining Tour

strIntroduction: Instead of knowing the history between South and North Korea through media, we should visit this place personally, shouldn't we? Come and see the Military Demarcation Line and learn about the Korean War once you travel in Korea!
strTitle: 【Mysterious 38 Degree North】DMZ Korea one-day Tour

strIntroduction: Taking Everland Daily Round-trip Shuttle, you can enjoy the day to the maximum with no time lost in vain at Everland and Caribbean Bay.
strTitle: Everland and Caribbean Bay Water Park Daily Round-trip Shuttle(Only for Foreigners)

strIntroduction: After graduating from Taiwan, Yuan Oppa went back to Korea in 2014 opening travel agencies. Every Winter, Yuan Oppa ski school offers professional skiing lectures, which Yuan Oppa teaches in person! Have you figured out what to do this winter? Let's join Yuan Oppa skiing class and have a unforgettable memory!
strTitle: Yuan Oppa Skiing and Snowboarding Groups in Korea (Class in Chinese)

strIntroduction: Have you ever dreamed to dress up like characters in Korean court drama? Various kinds of hanbok are waiting for you to experience!
strTitle: Jeju Hanbok Experience

strIntroduction: No need to worry about how to ski anymore! We launch a special shuttle service , regardless of departure from Seoul or airports can be easily connected to any of a South Korean ski resort !
strTitle: Shuttle bus service to and from the ski Resort in Korea
